name: Caesar Salad
description: Originally made in Italy by chef Caesar Cardini all the way back in the 1920s, the Caesar salad is a simple dish enjoyed by many internationally. Follow this easy recipe and enjoy your cheffin'!

steps.instruction: Chop the romaine lettuce into small pieces and put them into a bowl.
Add caesar salad dressing into bowl and mix the salad using a fork until thoroughly mixed.
Grate as much parmesan cheese as you wish into the bowl and add as much croutons as you want. Mix thoroughtly and serve!
